page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT JOBS
page.content: NUMBER OF ADULTS IN OUR SURVEY 50.MOST OF THE WOMEN IN OUR AREA WORK AT HOME. ONE IS A PART-TIME KNITTER.11 MEN ARE LOCAL FARMERS. MANY ARE SELF-EMPLOYED. THESE ARE A WALLER,A GARDENER,A BUILDER,AN ODD JOB MAN AND A FAMILY WHO RUN A HOLIDAY CENTRE. THERE IS A LOCAL POSTMAN LIVING IN THE BLOCK. ONE MAN IS AN ENGINEER WHO TRAVELS ABROAD. THE SOCIAL WORKER WORKS FROM THE PENRITH OFFICE. CHRIS'S UNCLE WORKS AT KIRKBY STEPHEN AUCTION. THE HICKMAN FAMILY HAVE MADE THE HOLIDAY CENTRE. THEY CAME FROM LONDON 4 YEARS AGO AND ALTERED AN OLD BARN TO MAKE THE CENTRE.THERE ARE 2 DORMITORIES AND MORE ROOMS FOR SLEEPING. UPSTAIRS THERE IS A LARGE ROOM FOR EATING AND FOR DOING WORK. LOTS OF SCHOOL PARTIES COME HERE TO ENJOY AND STUDY THE COUNTRYSIDE.
